summary: REQ-1 appears implemented by layering a dark linear-gradient over the existing desktop and mobile background images on the html element in frontend/src/index.css, while preserving cover/center/no-repeat/fixed behavior. However, the diff also includes additional unrelated styling/system changes (theme tokens/utilities) and project metadata updates that were not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Large-scale changes to global design tokens and theme variables (OKLCH color system, neon/glass variables) beyond darkening the background.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asks to darken the existing global background images via CSS overlay/gradient; it does not request a redesign of color tokens or theme palettes.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/modified global utility classes unrelated to the background darkening (e.g., .glass-surface, .neon-glow, .neon-text, .text-balance).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-1; REQ-1 is specific to darkening the site-wide background rendering.

hallucinated_features.description: Project tracking/metadata updates adding new_feature_requests (AR-1, AR-2) marked pending.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not part of the requested product change; BuildRequest does not mention updating project_state.json.
